text: As the LORD directed through Moses, they gave each of them their assignments for service and for transport; just as the LORD had commanded Moses.
and all the Arabah beyond the Jordan to the east, as far as the Arabah Sea under the slopes of Pisgah.
They made new sacred vessels and brought the lampstand, the altar of incense, and the table into the temple.
For this reason, even Tyrians, detesting the crime, provided sumptuously for their burial.
The royal official said to him, “Sir, come down before my child dies.”
